name: A Cheesy Game
description: A back-to-the-roots platformer that strives to be easy to understand, yet difficult to master. The game’s best features are its physics, level creator and of course – its endless supply of puns.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core 2.4Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce MX150 2GB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 350 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card Additional Notes: Gamepad Recommended
